intents.sub_intent: How to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs without compromising coverage
intents.search_context: Users search this when evaluating their current insurance plans or considering new ones
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's reputation for financial expertise to provide cost-saving strategies
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and examples

intents.sub_intent: What are the key elements of insurance policies?
intents.user_motivation: Users want to understand the structure and components of insurance plans
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing policies or preparing to purchase insurance
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's ability to simplify complex financial topics
intents.content_format_recommendation: Explainer article with visuals and examples

intents.sub_intent: How to avoid common mistakes when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid pitfalls that could lead to unfavorable claims outcomes
intents.search_context: Users search this after filing a claim or preparing for an insurance-related discussion
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide expert advice on navigating claims processes effectively

intents.sub_intent: How to maximize benefits from insurance claims
intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they receive the full value of their insurance coverage
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing an event requiring a claim
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Position ING as a trusted advisor for optimizing financial outcomes
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist with actionable steps and FAQs

intents.sub_intent: How to lower auto insurance costs
intents.user_motivation: Users want to find practical ways to reduce their monthly expenses
intents.search_context: Users search this when renewing policies or evaluating new providers
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's expertise in financial planning and cost management

How to lower auto insurance costs
